acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was a gift from K. Edward Lay, 104 Wilson Court, Charlottesville, Va. on 16 May 2000.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Cary D. Langhorne Professor of Architcture, University of Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Papers of K. Edward Lay consist of documentation of buildings and houses in Charlottesville and Albemarle County, Virginia, many of which are included in his book The architecture of Jefferson country and includes photographs, slides, measured drawings, copies of historical documents and correspondence.

The collection also contains historical information on Jefferson's master builders at the University of Virginia, the history of the University of Virginia School of Architecture, and architects who worked in Charlottesville and Albemarle County, Virginia.
